TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ProxyGenerator extends System.Object
public ref class ProxyGenerator abstract sealed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法可以检索 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 代码, 该代码用于生成 Web 服务的代理类、用于 Windows Communication Foundation 服务, 或者用于为应用了该特性的静态页方法生成。 Use the method to retrieve the ECMAScript (JavaScript) code that is used to generate the proxy class for a Web service, for a Windows Communication Foundation service, or for static page methods that have the attribute applied.

related.span: ASP.NET AJAX 中的 Web 服务

summary.span: 检索指定类型的代理生成代码。

span.span: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetClientProxyScript (Type type, string path, bool debug);
.method public static hidebysig string GetClientProxyScript(class System.Type type, string path, bool debug) cil managed
public: static System::String ^ GetClientProxyScript(Type ^ type, System::String ^ path, bool debug);
static member GetClientProxyScript : Type * string * bool -> string

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: type
param.span: 要获取其脚本的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of the object to obtain the script for.

param.name: debug
param.span: 表示包含 XML 代码注释；否则为 。

span.span: to include XML code comments; otherwise, .

summary.span: 检索指定类型的代理生成代码。

span.span: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为 Web 服务、Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务或已应用特性的静态页方法返回代理项 ECMAScript (JavaScript)。 The method returns the proxy-generation ECMAScript (JavaScript) for a Web service, for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service, or for static page methods that have the attribute applied. `type`参数包含 Web 服务类、WCF 服务类或 ASP.NET 页类的类型。The `type` parameter contains the type of the Web service class, WCF service class, or ASP.NET page class. 当类型为 WCF 服务类或接口时, 类或接口必须应用特性。When the type is a WCF service class or interface, the class or interface must have the attribute applied. 如果参数为`true`, 则生成的代码包含可用于 Visual Studio 或其他开发环境中的 IntelliSense 支持的 XML 代码注释。 `debug`If the `debug` parameter is `true`, the resulting code contains XML code comments that can be used for IntelliSense support in Visual Studio or other development environments. 因此, 生成的脚本的大小越大。As a result, the size of the generated script is larger.

exception.span: 代理生成不支持该指定类型。

span.span: The specified type is not supported for proxy generation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetClientProxyScript (Type type, string path, bool debug, System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint serviceEndpoint);

static member GetClientProxyScript : Type * string * bool * System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint -> string

summary.span: 使用路径和服务终结点检索指定类型的代理生成代码。

span.span: Retrieves the proxy generation code for the specified type using the path and service end point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法为 Web 服务、Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服务或已应用特性的静态页方法返回代理项 ECMAScript (JavaScript)。 The method returns the proxy-generation ECMAScript (JavaScript) for a Web service, for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service, or for static page methods that have the attribute applied. `type`参数包含 Web 服务类、WCF 服务类或 ASP.NET 页类的类型。The `type` parameter contains the type of the Web service class, WCF service class, or ASP.NET page class. 当类型为 WCF 服务类或接口时, 类或接口必须应用特性。When the type is a WCF service class or interface, the class or interface must have the attribute applied. 如果参数为`true`, 则生成的代码包含可用于 Visual Studio 或其他开发环境中的 IntelliSense 支持的 XML 代码注释。 `debug`If the `debug` parameter is `true`, the resulting code contains XML code comments that can be used for IntelliSense support in Visual Studio or other development environments. 因此, 生成的脚本的大小越大。As a result, the size of the generated script is larger.

exception.span: 代理生成不支持该指定类型。

span.span: The specified type is not supported for proxy generation.
